timeline.message:
Fix NormalizerAgg test searcher wrapping

The searcher was randomly wrapping its reader as slow, parallel, or filtered.
This was causing casting issues in the normalizer tests. By removing the
wrapping, the problem goes away.

Closes #57164

timeline.bodyText: @polyfractal just pointed me to AggregatorTestCase#newIndexSearcher which seems to do that job. It has even less randomization, but it looks to be what we're moving the tests to.
